title: Elementalist Lux Release
body: When is the skin released? I expected it this morning, I have the RP ready! It's an essential. I keep refreshing my client, but alas - nothing. Can someone give me a day pls. I'm dead here.....

replies.body: But why is the skin so good? It's just a glorified chroma pack

Not really. a chroma changes the base skin colour and gives it something fancy. this changes the outfit, the quotes, the recall, the abilities and much more! I mean dont get me wrong, but it seems you are a little butt hurt it was for Lux and not someone else (Not trying to start a fight just voicing my opinion hahaha) {{champion:99}}

TBH I dont agree with you, her design is really nice and its unique, and whats weaboo bait about this Lux skin? Are you sure you arnt referencing the Star Guardian skin set?

 You have to remember Ultimate skins take at least a year to make. and by the looks she wont be getting one for awhile, Sona got Sweetheart a year after DJ and I can assume it's safe to say nor will Lux, everyone in midlane has gotten a new skin with in the past year either it be release skin, or one that was to do with a seasonal event plus  they already have a ADC, Jungle, Support and Now a Mid lane Ultimate skin. It goes in a cycle! so its safe to say  Top lane will be next. 

Saying Lux has too many skins is the same with Hextech Annie, Soul Stealer Vayne, SG Jinx ect ect besides, she got SG Lux last year so that point is invalid. Jinx on the other hand got 2 skins with in the same year, and ekko hadn't been out with in a year and got academy and project! 

overall if you dont like the skin, dont complain about it in a public form because there will be people that think otherwise! just dont buy the skin too if you dont like it! if you buy the skin then there must be something you like about it.
